title: Whoever came up with Omega Squad Teemo has a sick & twisted sense of humor

replies.poster: J3 e c k e t t

replies.body:
I feel like he should've sat her down in a chair in a dark room, and then blindfold her. After he does this, he should tell her that there will be a present for her, and that she'll be able to see it soon. Then he takes his blowdart gun and executes her.

However, that's pretty cool what you wrote.

replies.body: Yeah I was going for a more dramatic execution.

Still wish that this was Teemo's relaunch instead because this is 100% more Teemo than his classic appearance.
Size doesn't mean everything!
But it *is* a liability.
Not to Pat Morita, it isn't.
I bought an RP card today... for this skin... I must have it.

Why did they even give him a skin? He is very annoying to play against early and late if ur not a tank, actually even if you are tank. He needs a rework so he becomes more viable and healthy for the game.

How is "really good in the laning phase, falls off hard later" unhealthy? I legitimately have to ask. 

That sounds like a thing that should stay. Lane bullies that fall off are perfectly healthy. The only time they feel like they aren't is when the game seems to revolve around the early/mid-game, which is a situation usually caused by the players and not the game itself. 

He's miserable to play against, but really ask yourself: how many champions with early game power aren't annoying to play against? Zed and LB certainly aren't a skip through the meadow. Nor is Riven, or lane Mantheon, or... and the list goes on. 

What makes Teemo so especially annoying besides his shrooms? He's not even the worst offender of his own strengths.

Teemo's not unhealthy. 

He's a lane bully that can only effectively bully a very small number of top laners. Even if he wins lane, his teamfighting ability is almost nonexistent because of his limited utility and very low DPS - he can't burst anybody, he can't lock anyone down, and the only thing he really provides is a high amount of map control. 

Basically, Teemo is annoying to pretty much everybody in the game that isn't Teemo. He's not fun to lane against, nobody likes dealing with his shrooms now that oracles is gone, and his team doesn't like having him because you're basically forfeiting a strong teamfight phase in the hopes that Teemo's lane opponent will be similarly useless because they got shutdown. 

There's also the fact that the dude has way too many skins, already. It honestly really annoys me that Teemo is getting another skin when so many other champions need one.

I can make Teemo do a good face melting all about how you build a little brat there's hundreds of different ways of building him Teemo's blinding dart is not a joke it can fuck you up  all need
{{item:3089}} {{item:3085}} {{item:3151}} {{item:3165}} {{item:3135}} {{item:3254}} {{summoner:6}} {{summoner:13}} flat magic penetration runes all the rest. ability power or attack power and attack power for early game and ability power for late game you want to try to win the game as fast as possible or do you want to guarantee a win later all your masteries points in attack{{champion:17}} deal with it

I honestly prefer to go full annoyance and be tanky.

{{item:3065}} {{item:3068}} {{item:3091}} {{item:3083}} {{item:3269}} {{item:3102}} {{summoner:3}} {{summoner:12}} 

May not be exactly what I use (its been a while) but that plus a full defense mastery page and some flat armor, scaling magic resist, and attack speed runes.

Bear in mind I'd never use this outside of top lane and this heavily abuses what I've learned is the "Teemo taunt". His unknown and unregistered passive that will occasionally make nearby opponents ignore objectives and potential danger to kill Teemo for being Teemo.
